Title: Aimplify - AI Automation for your business

Banner.title: Accepting 3 new clients. Get started today.

title.main: Your Operations: <break >Save Time & Money with AI Automation</break>
title.description: We help you automate your workflows, automate repetitive tasks,  and elevate your business.

Why.title: You can't beat AI... so why not <underline>use</underline> it?
Why.description: With the public launch of OpenAI's ChatGPT and the GPT-4 LLM, people are starting to see the true power of AI. We help you utilize that power into your business.

section_1.title: Stop wasting hundreds of work hours on repetitive tasks
section_1.description: Using powerful workflow automations we are able to help you automate annoying and time-heavy tasks.

section_2.title: Let AI handle 80% of your customer support
section_2.description: Using the power of AI chatbots trained on all of your company data, you will be able to handle 80% of your support tickets with AI.

section_3.title: Offload new customers onboarding to AI
section_3.description: Chatbots for internal use can make your employee's life 10x easier, and make them 10x more productive.

service1.title: Customer support chatbots
service1.description: We build custom chatbots trained on all of your company data - product descriptions, specifications, PDFs, customer support chat database, etc…

service2.title: Workflow automations
service2.description: Manually doing repetitive tasks not only takes more time but also leaves room for human error. By creating AI workflow automations for your specific needs you'll be able to offload hours of work.

service3.title: Chatbots for internal use
service3.description: Chatbots are not only useful for customer support. Internal use chatbots can be used for a variety of tasks - like helping onboard new employees, answering common questions, scheduling calls, etc.

step1.title: Book your free discovery call
step1.description: On this call you'll share a little more about your company, the processes you have in place, and we will suggest areas in which AI can help you

step2.title: Planning & strategy session
step2.description: If we're a fit, after the discovery call we will start planning the course of action. We'll schedule a Strategy Session call where we will share with you the next steps, and adjust the plan if needed.

step3.title: Development
step3.description: Once we've agreed on the strategy and plan of action, we get to work and start developing your new AI solutions.

step4.title: Deployment + optimization
step4.description: Once we're ready with the development, we will deploy the product and start looking for potential areas of improvement.

paragraphs.p1: The goal of this call is to get to know you and your business, and see if you're a good fit. Find a slot that works for you on the Calendar and let's talk!

lists.l1: Companies looking to improve their efficiency
lists.l2: Founders and C-Level executives with specific ideas of how to implement AI into their companies
lists.l3: Founders and C-Level executives looking to better understand AI and how to implement it in their companies

Cta.title: Ready to <underline>move</underline> ahead?
Cta.description: We help you automate your workflows, automate repetitive tasks, and elevate your business.
